name: Mountain Jeep Parking: Off-Road Crazy Drifting 3D
name_original: Mountain Jeep Parking: Off-Road Crazy Drifting 3D
description:
Get ready for the real life off road racing adventures of 4 X 4 Jeep! Be the most intense and quickest off road rider by driving the fastest 4 X 4 jeep in 3D fast racing action with least possible time. If you like jeep rally simulator games then test your real off-road drifting skills and challenge your friends by achieving best high scores.
The reality of speed racing with extremely high quality graphics with beautiful surrounding graphical environments. Enjoy the amazing advanced real physics and fast-paced game play in this high speed off road racing adventurous game. Test your determination, reflex and riving skills and have extreme fun on high speed in off road race simulator. Complete it successful with best time and you will be king of the road.

Game Play:
Tilt your device to control jeep.
Touch gas pedal to accelerate.
Touch brake pedal to slow down.
Set best time records and compete with friends.
